titles.title: Tezuka Osamu ga Kieta?! 20 Seiki Saigo no Kaijiken
Tezuka Osamu Collection: 20th Century Last Mystery
Tezuka Osamu ga Kieta?! Nijusseiki Saigo no Kaijiken
Tezuka Osamu ga Kieta?! Nijisseiki Saigo no Kaijiken
手塚治虫が消えた?! 20世紀最後の怪事件

anime.description: New Year`s Eve 2000. An eternally juvenile http://anidb.net/cr1195 [Tezuka Osamu] meets his creations for a New Year`s Eve party at the Dr. Tenma`s mansion, but before the event begins he suddenly disappears from his room in what looks like a kidnapping. A classic mystery setting for, at the end, a lovely homage to the man behind the genius.

externalentity.identifier: 手塚治虫が消えた!%3F_20世紀最後の怪事件

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: mystery
tag.description: The mystery film is a sub-genre of the more general category of crime film. It focuses on the efforts of the detective, private investigator or amateur sleuth to solve the mysterious circumstances of a crime by means of clues, investigation, and clever deduction. (Source: Wikipedia)

character.name: Black Jack
character.description: Black Jack is a mysterious and charismatic young genius surgeon who travels the world performing amazing and impossible surgery. Because of his hatred of the hypocrisy and corruption of the medical establishment, Black Jack refuses to accept a medical license, and runs into frequent difficulties from the authorities, as well as from gangsters and criminals who approach him for illegal operations. Black Jack charges ludicrous fees for his services, and uses the proceeds for environmental projects and to aid the victims of criminals and corrupt capitalsts, but he rarely allows anyone to realize that he is a good person, preferring to be considered a heartless devil.

character.name: Pinoko
character.description: Pinoko, is a hyperactive, fiercely possessive little girl, who lives in Black Jack`s house, doing his cooking and laundry and serving as his nurse and assistant, and the only steady long-term companion the unlucky Dr. Black Jack has ever had, and just about the only person who can embarrass or joke with him. Insisting that she is the doctor`s wife despite her obvious youth, Pinoko puzzle to anyone who meets her, and especially to anime viewers who don`t know her origin and wonder why the grim and solitary Black Jack is living with what seems to be a cute, annoying little girl.

character.name: Uran
character.description: Uranium is Astro Boy`s sister constructed by Dr. Ochanomizu as a gift for his birthday. Has 100,000 horsepower strengh.

character.name: Tezuka Osamu
character.description: Osamu Tezuka`s anime/manga version of himself
